title: Big Dog B-Day, Ed Gordon Interview, Sheryl Underwood, Carla's Reality Update and more.
itunes:title: Big Dog B-Day, Ed Gordon Interview, Sheryl Underwood, Carla's Reality Update and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! We are one day away from Steve's birthday. There is a mother/daughter lottery situation that Steve breaks down. Ed Gordon talks about his new book. The Mississippi prison system is under the microscope. Sheryl Underwood is here to talk about the debate and her main squeeze Junior. Miss Carla covers Real Housewives of Atlanta in Reality Update. Whitney, B.I.G., and The Doobie Brothers are going into the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame. Today in Closing Remarks, Uncle Steve talks to us about building our future, plus so much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
